臺.definition: platform; stage; terrace; stand; support; station; broadcasting station; classifier for vehicles or machines

臺上一分鐘，臺下十年功.pinyin: tái shàng yī fēn zhōng ， tái xià shí nián gōng
臺上一分鐘，臺下十年功.definition: ten years of practice for one minute on the stage (idiom)

臺中.definition: Taizhong or Taichung city in central Taiwan

臺中市.definition: Taichung, a city in central Taiwan

臺兒莊.definition: Tai'erzhuang district of Zaozhuang city 棗莊市|枣庄市[Zao3 zhuang1 shi4], Shandong

臺北市.definition: Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan

臺北縣.definition: Taipei County in north Taiwan (now renamed 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4])

臺南市.definition: Tainan city in Tainan county 臺南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan

臺南府.definition: Tainan Prefecture, a prefecture of Taiwan under Qing rule

臺大.definition: abbr. for 臺灣大學|台湾大学[Tai2 wan1 Da4 xue2]

臺本.definition: script (of a play, movie, or television program)

臺海.definition: abbr. for 台灣海峽|台湾海峡, Taiwan Strait

臺灣土狗.definition: Formosan mountain dog, a breed native to Taiwan

臺灣大學.definition: National Taiwan University; abbr. to 臺大|台大[Tai2 Da4]

臺灣山鷓鴣.definition: (bird species of China) Taiwan partridge (Arborophila crudigularis)

臺灣擬啄木鳥.pinyin: tái wān nǐ zhuó mù niǎo
臺灣擬啄木鳥.definition: (bird species of China) Taiwan barbet (Psilopogon nuchalis)

臺灣斑翅鶥.definition: (bird species of China) Taiwan barwing (Actinodura morrisoniana)

臺灣斑胸鉤嘴鶥.pinyin: tái wān bān xiōng gōu zuǐ méi
臺灣斑胸鉤嘴鶥.definition: (bird species of China) black-necklaced scimitar babbler (Erythrogenys erythrocnemis)

臺灣林鴝.definition: (bird species of China) collared bush robin (Tarsiger johnstoniae)

臺灣棕噪鶥.definition: (bird species of China) rusty laughingthrush (Pterorhinus poecilorhynchus)

臺灣棕頸鉤嘴鶥.pinyin: tái wān zōng jǐng gōu zuǐ méi
臺灣棕頸鉤嘴鶥.definition: (bird species of China) Taiwan scimitar babbler (Pomatorhinus musicus)

臺灣畫眉.definition: (bird species of China) Taiwan hwamei (Garrulax taewanus)

臺灣白喉噪鶥.pinyin: tái wān bái hóu zào méi
臺灣白喉噪鶥.definition: (bird species of China) rufous-crowned laughingthrush (Pterorhinus ruficeps)

臺灣短翅鶯.definition: (bird species of China) Taiwan bush warbler (Locustella alishanensis)

臺灣紫嘯鶇.definition: (bird species of China) Taiwan whistling thrush (Myophonus insularis)

臺灣藍鵲.definition: (bird species of China) Taiwan blue magpie (Urocissa caerulea)

臺灣酒紅朱雀.pinyin: tái wān jiǔ hóng zhū què
臺灣酒紅朱雀.definition: (bird species of China) Taiwan rosefinch (Carpodacus formosanus)

臺灣雀鶥.definition: (bird species of China) grey-cheeked fulvetta (Alcippe morrisonia)

臺灣鵯.definition: (bird species of China) Styan's bulbul; Taiwan bulbul (Pycnonotus taivanus)

臺灣鷦鶥.definition: (bird species of China) Taiwan cupwing; Taiwan wren-babbler (Pnoepyga formosana)

臺灣黃山雀.definition: (bird species of China) yellow tit (Machlolophus holsti)

臺羅字.definition: Tai-lo, romanization system for Taiwanese Hokkien (abbr. for 臺灣閩南語羅馬字拼音方案|台湾闽南语罗马字拼音方案[Tai2wan1 Min3nan2yu3 Luo2ma3zi4 Pin1yin1 Fang1an4])

臺蛙.definition: (derog.) Taiwanese; a person from Taiwan (implying naivete or ignorance regarding geopolitical and economic realities) (cf. 井底之蛙[jing3di3zhi1wa1] sb with a narrow view of the world)

臺西.definition: Taixi or Taihsi township in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan

臺西鄉.definition: Taixi or Taihsi township in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan

臺視.definition: abbr. for 臺灣電視公司|台湾电视公司, Taiwan Television (TTV)

臺詞.definition: an actor's lines; dialogue; Taiwanese word

臺階.definition: steps; flight of steps; step (over obstacle); fig. way out of an embarrassing situation; bench (geology)
